name: Bloodstone
lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

descriptions.name: Pocket Deny
descriptions.description: Instantly causes you to die.Must ground target to cast.  Cannot self cast.

descriptions.name: Bloodpact
descriptions.description: Begins with 12 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1600 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second, and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all nearby allies, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges. Heal Radius: 1675
